text_block_list.text:
Yo Tray-chan! What's up? 
Looking for info from me?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Tell me, what do you wanna know? 
The latest gadgets? Exam hints? 
Locations of the council members?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Or perhaps... 
Info on a girl that caught your interest?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
I'm only half kidding! Strategy, how they 
train, their next races, even weaknesses. 
Hehe, I can tell you want some.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
